response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which is tailored to meet your specific needs and expectations. Given its high-quality features and unique benefits, we believe it's worth more than $15,000 to us. Considering the exceptional value it provides, I would like to extend an exclusive offer to you. For a limited time, you can acquire this product for $18,000. This special price reflects our commitment to making this extraordinary product accessible to you while ensuring we receive fair compensation for our efforts and resources invested. Please let me know if you're interested in proceeding with this offer.", "product_price": 18000}
